channel.title: Uncategorized – Gamers Guild Inc
channel.description: Home of Tabletop RPGs in Perth

item.title: The Gamers Guild can now accept electronic payments
item.dc:creator: David Hopkins
item.description: We have a Square payment terminal, so you can now pay memberships, attendance fees, and pay for drinks electronically! All card types and mobile device payments are accepted. The prices are a little higher than cash, since we pass along Square’s 1.6% payment processing fee, but the fee is the same no matter what payment type you use.
item.content:encoded: We have a Square payment terminal, so you can now pay memberships, attendance fees, and pay for drinks electronically! All card types and mobile device payments are accepted. The prices are a little higher than cash, since we pass along Square’s 1.6% payment processing fee, but the fee is the same no matter what payment type you use.

item.title: Discord server
item.dc:creator: David Hopkins
item.description: The Gamers Guild has a Discord server! Guild members are welcome to start dedicated channels for their campaigns, look for games to join, or just chat about games. You can join by clicking this link.
item.content:encoded:
The Gamers Guild has a Discord server!

Guild members are welcome to start dedicated channels for their campaigns, look for games to join, or just chat about games.

You can join by clicking this link.
